named-query.name: Employee.searchById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.id = :searchKeyword

named-query.name: Employee.searchByName
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM Employee e WHERE e.name like :searchKeyword

named-native-query.name: Employee.searchByDeptId
named-native-query.query: SELECT E.ID, E.NAME ename, E.SALARY, D.NAME dname FROM S_EMP E, S_DEPT D WHERE E.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND E.DEPT_ID = :deptId
